oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Nashville Municipal Auditorium
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Nashville Municipal Auditorium, which opened in October of 1962, is located on James Robertson Parkway. Designed by Marr and Holman, the auditorium has three levels and seats 10,550 people. This view shows Municipal Auditorium under construction in 1961 and shows the Davidson County Courthouse in the background. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Municipal Auditorium
Architecture; Auditoriums; Capital City; City government
Nashville (Tenn.); James Robertson Parkway
